author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
With the merging of  #27823 , #27941 and https://github.com/cms-data/SimTracker-SiStripDigitizer/pull/1 we have now all the ingredients to be able to test (on selected dedicated workflows) the activation of the SiStrip APV dynamic gain simulation in 2016 MC.
This PR:
   * adds 4 TTbar workflow with the feature activated in the digitizer: `1325.6` (TTbar 2016, noPU), `25202.1` (TTbar + PU, std. mixing),  `250202.2` (TTbar + PU, premixing) and  `250202.3` (TTbar + PU, premixing - redoing the mixing library). 
   * slightly changes the `SiStripApvSimulationParametersESProducer` in order to be able to cope with the absence of parameters for the EndCaps. 

N.B.: for the premixing to work correctly it is needed to include the changes in #28028.

#### PR validation:
Code changes passes dedicated testing via:
```
 runTheMatrix.py -l 1325.6 ,25202.1,250202.2,250202.3 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos --command='-n 200'
```
The outcome has been used to check the effect of the simulation, full set of Strip DQM is available [here](http://musich.web.cern.ch/musich/UltraLegacy/StripAPVGain/compareTTbar_fixed/?match=Summary)
 a couple of plots is attached:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/65316533-74a61a00-db9a-11e9-9ba0-ff015c81b129.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/65316497-62c47700-db9a-11e9-87ef-ad8bdc3666c9.png)

title: Introduce Special RelVals for SiStrip APV dynamic gain simulation
